title: ‘SNL’ recap: Best moments from Bad Bunny hosting ‘Saturday Night Live’ premiere
author: Kevin Slane
bullets: Entertainment Bad Bunny hosted the Season 51 premiere of "Saturday Night Live" on October 4, with Doja Cat as musical guest.

title: Police use drone to catch teen suspect who allegedly broke into dozens of cars
author: Darin Zullo
bullets: Crime A number of items were stolen from the cars, including a laptop, car keys, house keys, and cash, according to police.
By Darin Zullo October 5, 2025 | 9:35 AM 1 minute to read Police in Hingham arrested a Holbrook teen Friday after he and another suspect allegedly broke into about 60 cars in one night.

title: Study shows Mass. has the wealthiest colleges in the country. Here’s how they rank.

title: Patriots set to be without key pass rusher vs. Bills
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots will have to beat the Bills without K'Lavon Chaisson, who has emerged as a key part of the team's defensive front.
K'Lavon Chaisson has recorded 2.
5 sacks so far this season.

title: 5 things to know about Bills ahead of Sunday’s game vs. Patriots
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The Patriots will get their best chance to see how they stack up with one of the league's elite teams on Sunday.
Josh Allen is setting himself up to possibly win MVP for a second straight season.
(AP Photo/Adrian Kraus) By Conor Roche October 4, 2025 | 3:23 PM 4 minutes to read The biggest game of the Patriots’ season to this point will take place on Sunday.

title: Alex Bregman reportedly still a ‘near certainty’ to opt out of Red Sox contract
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Red Sox Bregman can opt out of the two seasons remaining on his three-year, $120 million deal this offseason.
Alex Bregman was arguably the Red Sox' best hitter in 2025, but his play tailed off in the final month of the season.

Barry Chin/Globe Staff By Conor Roche October 4, 2025 | 12:33 PM 2 minutes to read Alex Bregman wasn’t willing to make a commitment on his future when he spoke with reporters shortly after the Red Sox’ season-ending loss to the Yankees on Thursday.

title: Review & setlist: David Byrne is what the world needs now
author: Peter Chianca
bullets: Concert Reviews The former Talking Heads frontman brought his mobile ensemble to the Wang for a life-affirming romp.
David Byrne brought his band to Wang Theatre in Boston this week.

title: NBA insider: There’s ‘buzz’ Jayson Tatum could return in March
author: Conor Roche
bullets: Boston Celtics Tatum has left the door open to possibly return from his Achilles tear in the 2025-26 season.
Jayson Tatum will likely miss most of the 2025-26 season as he rehabs from an Achilles tear.

(AP Photo/Michael Dwyer) By Conor Roche October 4, 2025 | 11:07 AM 2 minutes to read Jayson Tatum has appeared to make tremendous strides in his rehab from tearing his Achilles, providing some hope that he might be able to return in the 2025-26 season.

title: Mass. man dies in fall from mountain while hunting goats in Alaska
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News The 67-year-old man fell about 100 feet, then slid another several hundred feet after he lost his footing.
A Massachusetts man died Wednesday after falling while goat hunting in a remote Alaskan mountain near Cordova, Alaska State Troopers announced.
Troopers said 67-year-old John DeLuca suffered fatal injuries when he lost his footing and fell from Queen’s Chair around 10:45 a.

title: Teen on modified e-bike charged after getting hit by vehicle in Milford
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Police say the teen ran a red light before colliding with a car in a Milford intersection.
A 15-year-old is facing multiple traffic charges after a suped-up e-bike he was driving collided with a vehicle in a Milford intersection, authorities said.
The incident happened on Tuesday at the intersection of Main and Exchange Streets, according to the Milford Police Department.
